attributes.action: government to live on lowest benefits before taking posts
attributes.additional_details:
As a suffer of a debilitaing condion I want  all politician’s  to spend 2 Months living in my income from my benefits day to day while trying to take care of himself in my home  as well as helping look after my disabled wife  on a day to day basis.
I want them  to live as  we  have to  on our income and see how they can cope on an impossibly reducing benefit,  and possibly learn a few ways this country can be improved
